name: Build Chaos APK - Gimmeful Edition!

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  pull_request:
    branches:
      - main
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  build-apk:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    environment:
      name: chaos-build-env
      url: https://example.com/chaos-builds  # Replace with a fun URL

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code 🚀
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Flutter ✨
        uses: subosito/flutter-action@v2
        with:
          flutter-version: 3.13.9
          channel: stable

      - name: Flutter Doctor 🩺
        run: flutter doctor -v

      - name: Get dependencies 📦
        run: flutter pub get

      - name: Cache Flutter dependencies 💾
        uses: actions/cache@v3
        with:
          path: |
            ~/.pub-cache
            /opt/flutter/packages
          key: ${{ runner.os }}-flutter-deps-${{ hashFiles('**/pubspec.lock') }}
          restore-keys: |
            ${{ runner.os }}-flutter-deps-

      - name: Build APK 🔨
        run: flutter build apk --split-per-abi --build-mode release

      - name: Random Motivational Quote 🌟
        run: |
          QUOTE=$(curl -s https://zenquotes.io/api/random)
          echo "✨ Motivational Quote: $QUOTE ✨"

      - name: Sign APK 🔑 (with a little drama)
        env:
          KEYSTORE_FILE: ${{ secrets.KEYSTORE_FILE }}
          KEY_ALIAS: ${{ secrets.KEY_ALIAS }}
          KEY_PASSWORD: ${{ secrets.KEY_PASSWORD }}
          STORE_PASSWORD: ${{ secrets.STORE_PASSWORD }}
        run: |
          echo "⏳ Preparing to sign the APK... this is a critical moment! ⏳"
          echo "$KEYSTORE_FILE" > keystore.jks
          jarsigner -verbose -sigalg SHA256withRSA -digestalg SHA-256 -keystore keystore.jks build/app/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk "$KEY_ALIAS"
          zipalign -v 4 build/app/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk app-release-aligned.apk
          echo "🎉 APK successfully signed!  Phew! 🎉"

      - name: Upload APK Artifact 📤
        uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
        with:
          name: chaos-apk-${{ github.run_number }}-${{ github.run_id }}-with-sparkles.apk
          path: build/app/outputs/apk/release/app-release-aligned.apk
          retention-days: 5

      - name: Celebrate! 🥳
        run: echo "Workflow completed successfully! Time for a virtual high-five! ✋"
